explanation: [0-0] A woman wearing a pink dress is sitting in front of a dining table, wearing black-rimmed glasses and holding a pair of chopsticks in her right hand. There are a lot of food on the table in front of her, including tomatoes, vegetables, rice and some sauces, and a glass bottle on the right side of the table. There are white words above the picture: "Problems of living with my Vietnamese gf".
